title: Incase Logo
content:
Hello all,

I would love any help trying to identify the font used on this logo:

Thanks in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [incase\_bw.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20120427160705/http:/typophile.com/files/incase_bw.gif) | 925 bytes |
| [incase.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20120427160705/http:/typophile.com/files/incase.gif) | 4.25 KB |
author: dando76

comments.content:
I'd say the logo is based on Chalet New York 1980. The "n" is from Chalet New York 1970 with the "i", "a" and "n" rounded by hand.

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20120427160705/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts")
Thanks for your help and fast reply!
